desc: Quizzards is an Australian owned trivia company, selling trivia packs and presentations. Perfect for pub quizzes, fundraisers, and corporate events.

layout.text:
Our fun and interactive screen packs are perfect for any trivia event, big or small.

Fundraising? Hosting a trivia night is a fun, competitive way to raise money.

Own a bar or restaurant and need to get customers through the doors on quiet nights? Try a monthly trivia night!
